{"id":931147701,"question_id":2721,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681112505,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"98 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/931147701/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum of Distances","memory":"75.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long[] distance(int[] arr) {\n        long[] output = new long[arr.length];\n        Map<Integer, Long> sumMap = new HashMap<>();\n        Map<Integer, Integer> countMap = new HashMap<>();\n        for (int i = 0; i < arr.length; ++ i) {\n            if (!sumMap.containsKey(arr[i])) {\n                sumMap.put(arr[i], 0l);\n                countMap.put(arr[i], 0);\n            }\n            \n            output[i] += i * (long)countMap.get(arr[i]) - sumMap.get(arr[i]);\n            sumMap.put(arr[i], sumMap.get(arr[i]) + i);\n            countMap.put(arr[i], countMap.get(arr[i]) + 1);\n        }\n        \n        sumMap = new HashMap<>();\n        countMap = new HashMap<>();\n        int len = arr.length;\n        for (int i = len - 1; i >= 0; -- i) {\n            if (!sumMap.containsKey(arr[i])) {\n                sumMap.put(arr[i], 0l);\n                countMap.put(arr[i], 0);\n            }\n            \n            output[i] += (len - i - 1) * (long)countMap.get(arr[i]) - sumMap.get(arr[i]);\n            sumMap.put(arr[i], sumMap.get(arr[i]) + (len - i - 1));\n            countMap.put(arr[i], countMap.get(arr[i]) + 1);\n        }\n        \n        return output;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-of-distances","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
